title: HeroxMaou - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Cute Story   Demon Lord   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kidnappings   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Sword And Magic

description:
A slightly perverted Hero that loves the demon lord so much he can’t help it and an insensitive demon lord who cannot understand why she is being doted on.

A story of the two filled with (the hero’s) love.>
